meanings.definition: To make healthy, whole, or sound again
meanings.sent2: She believes that laughter heals the soul.
meanings.sent3: His magic potion heals even the grumpiest of trolls.
meanings.sent4: Kindness heals the heart in ways medicine cannot.
meanings.sent5: The soothing music heals her troubled mind.

meanings.definition: To restore to health or well-being
meanings.sent1: A good night's sleep heals a tired body.
meanings.sent2: Her mother's chicken soup always heals her when she's sick.
meanings.sent3: The doctor's silly jokes heal his patients' spirits.
meanings.sent4: Nature's beauty has a healing power that heals the soul.
meanings.sent5: The fresh air and sunshine heal him after a long day at work.

meanings.definition: To repair or mend (a wound, injury, etc.)
meanings.sent1: The bandage heals the cut on his finger.
meanings.sent2: Stitches are needed to heal the deep wound.
meanings.sent3: Her homemade soup heals the hunger of her friends.
meanings.sent4: Time and love can heal even the deepest scars.
meanings.sent5: The gentle touch of a friend can heal emotional wounds.
